reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I originaly tried to book the Kasbah Toubkal but it was full so they advised me the Dar Imlil riad, which they see as an extension of the Kasbah 500 metres away in Imlil village, had a vacancy so we booked in there.
reviews.title: Dar Imlil - better than the Kasbah
